title: Thanks to Justin Trudeau, the 2nd Amendment Is Safe (For Now) | 5/31/22
description:
Glenn and Stu kick off the show discussing "Top Gun: Maverick," Tom Cruise's likability, and his connections to Scientology. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss Canada's radical new gun agenda. Glenn and Stu evaluate the current status of politicians, as Biden's approval rating is hitting record-breaking lows. Glenn plays a game with Stu called "Bee or Not the Bee." Newly released documents showcase how the government plans to respond to possible apocalyptic scenarios and the president's powers. Glenn and Stu discuss the dramatic decline in the number of pastors who hold a biblical worldview or even believe in God. The Democrats' radical beliefs on children and sexuality have gotten even more radical as Disney announced its new pride celebration special.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
